text: Tam'made kaigalinda granthavannu baredu, a balika adannu aggada belege maruvudakkagi ‘‘idu allahana kadeyinda bandide’’ ennuva janarige vinasa kadide. Tam'ma kaigalinda avaru enannu baredaro adakkagiyu avarige vinasavide mattu a mulaka avaru enannu sampadisiruvaro adakkagiyu avarige vinasa kadide
